bib.title: Method for aspect-based sentiment annotation using rhetorical analysis
bib.author: Augustyniak, {\L}ukasz and Rajda, Krzysztof and Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: This paper fills a gap in aspect-based sentiment analysis and aims to present a new method for preparing and analysing texts concerning opinion and generating user-friendly descriptive reports in natural language. We present a comprehensive set of techniques derived from Rhetorical Structure Theory and sentiment analysis to extract aspects from textual opinions and then build an abstractive summary of a set of opinions. Moreover, we propose aspect-aspect graphs to evaluate the importance of aspects and to filter out
